document.full_text: bringing swiss miners glencore  and xstrata  together would add value but is not on the agenda at the moment, glencore chief executive ivan glasenberg said in a newspaper interview on saturday.
document.title: new glencore board to decide on xstrata merger: report
lines_and_colors: bringing swiss miners glencore  and xstrata  together would add value but is not on the agenda at the moment, glencore chief executive ivan glasenberg said in a newspaper interview on saturday.
